title: Ep. 205: The Cazador and the Coues
itunes:title: Ep. 205: The Cazador and the Coues
description:
Steven Rinella talks with Kevin Sloan, Anthony Licata, Seth Morris, Ryan Callaghan, Phil Taylor, and Janis Putelis.

Topics discussed: A Viking funeral for a severed finger; pressure washing bear meat out of your sinuses; Anthony's cartel run-in; Steve's almost negligent shittiness at speaking Spanish; where persistence meets movement; Kevin seeing the shine off a deer’s nose; the half-wild dogs of Sonora and the one that stole Steve’s heart; pickles; MeatEater's live tour; and more.

 

Connect with Steve and MeatEater

MeatEater on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube
